/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a serene street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, is flanked by lush greenery on both sides. A large willow tree stands majestically in the center, its leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The road, a smooth gray surface, stretches out ahead, disappearing into the distance. On the right side of the road, a solitary car is parked, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise tranquil scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds dotting the horizon. The image is captured from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the towering trees and the expansive sky. The colors in the image are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and dimension, drawing the viewer into the scene.
